titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the re-printing, publishing, and using of a book, intituled, God and the King
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at the court at Whitehall, December the fifth, 1662, in the fourteenth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
